h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Plantain Fan Location
content: The Plantain Fan Vessel can be found upon completing the Flaming Mountains chapter. At the end of it, the Vessel will be given to you by Princess Iron Fan.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Plantain_Fan.md', within the main section titled 'Plantain Fan', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Plantain Fan Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Plantain Fan Vessel can be found upon completing the Flaming Mountains chapter. At the end of it, the Vessel will be given to you by Princess Iron Fan.
